website_summaries.verdict: A powerful top-of-the-line wireless speaker that's Alexa-compatible and offers excellent sound quality.
pros: We love that it's compatible with a range of streaming services plus your existing music library
Easy to control with an integrated app and intuitive remote control
Stands out for its rich, true-to-life sound
cons: Some users report issues with Wi-Fi connection

website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundTouch 30 keeps a good pace for both price and feature count with mostly excellent sound quality, particularly at moderate volumes.
pros: The Bose SoundTouch 30 is a large, likable tabletop Wi-Fi speaker which offers convenience features like Bluetooth and shortcut buttons
The app is pleasant to use and most functions are straightforward
The sound is immediately impressive with deep bass and an articulate, exciting midrange
The ability to tailor the bass response to your taste is welcome
cons: Bass is overemphasized by default and can distort at higher volumes
The revealing nature of the speaker means some genres of music can sound quickly tiresome
The competing Sonos offers more services over Wi-Fi, more sound-tailoring features and a better app

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, as you would expect from Bose
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, as you would expect from Bose. However, the software to manage the system with other Bose speakers is not what I anticipated. Poorly designed or delivered or both. I have multiple Soundtouch Bose devices which are supposed to work well together, but rarely do. Bottom line... if you are buying a single Bose system to produce great sound, you will enjoy. If you are trying to link multiple wifi based Bose systems as they promote, you will be severely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesriver

customer_reviews.title: Remote device functionality is very poor
customer_reviews.text: Good quality music as expected, however, the software needs much help. Once the presets are established, they perform as expected (from the device pad, not from your phone or other personal device). It's way to difficult to setup (would be easy but doesn't work most of the time). When it does work, it doesn't take long before it needs to be setup again, and there is no automated troubleshooting, basically you get an error code and a message to try again later. However, this product works fine in Bluetooth. Basically it's a high quality Bluetooth speaker with some presets that are activated manually.
customer_reviews.author: Aloin

customer_reviews.title: This sounds great. Love the all white finish
customer_reviews.text: Updated my series I with this series III. This sounds great. Love the all white finish, good asthelics. But the reason I bought this was for the sound, and boy does it sound good. This fills up our living room and with a Cinema Mate 130 both sound fantastic. I don't use the bluetooth feature, but its good Bose added that function. Very happy Bose FINALLY added more music services last December. Overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert R.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sounding portable speakers I have ever listened to
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding portable speakers I have ever listened to. I own a Bose PC speaker system, Bose 201's, Bose 302's, And now the SoundTouch 30 series. The sound is pure. The bass is unbelievable! Whether you have the volume low or you crank it up the sound is the way it should be. I guarantee you will not be dissatisfied spending $500 on this item. My saying is "you get what you pay for" If you are a true music audiophile, you got to invest in the 30 series.
customer_reviews.author: timu329

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I worked at Bose for 8 years and even after I moved on continued to own/purchase countless products ( 2 sets of noise cancelling buds, QC35, sounddocks, Solo 15 etc..). I was always impressed with their sound and product quality. I bought the Soundtouch 30 expecting the same level of quality. Not so much! Today it crapped out and gave an error message. Tried to reset it to the factory setting. Nothing. Fortunately I was only 3 weeks out of my warranty, Bose will honor the repair. Nope, Nothing again. Sadly this will be my last Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was great but the connectivity through Bluetooth was horrendous. The music would stop playing or pause for a long time while using my iPad. Playing from the computer was great but I do the majority of my music from my phone or iPad. Very disappointed in Bose especially for the price. My small Bluetooth speaker (Bose) has better connectivity. Was so disappointed I returned it and got my money back
customer_reviews.author: Cufflynk

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What an upgrade from my little $20 speaker I've been using for years. This speaker sounds fantastic! Took a little effort figuring how to hook it all up but I figured it out. Definitely recommend! For some reason I'm not able to connect via Bluetooth but it was working. I have to call again I just haven't wanted to deal with it. They did have a problem with Pandora freezing but they fixed that. Looks nice on the stand in my small place. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: I love the soundtouch 30
customer_reviews.text: I am a Bose fan since they're introduced. I still have the floor standing 601 and 301 series for my home theatre. I love the soundtouch 30. The UE Megaboom which I tried is nowhere near the soundtouch 30 in terms of clarity of sound, etc. I can listen to Pandora, Amazon Music, Internet Radio and save at least 6 of these via its presets. When I turn it on, it automatically connect to my iPhone 7 Plus. Setting it up is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak,Bass was weak,and it stopped working after about a week
customer_reviews.text: Customer service sucks,and I love Hip Hop,this is not what you want to use to play this type of music,I am going over to the Sonos Play 5 now. My advice to Bose,is to sell your products to your customer service Reps. The Bose app Sucks,and barely works,and there are all kinds of connectivity issues. In Short,The App Sucks,The unit it self sucks,and customer service is really nonexisting.
customer_reviews.author: The Neighborhood VR Experience

customer_reviews.title: Not very portable with no battery function
customer_reviews.text: Bose is a great system but I mistakenly assumed this unit would have a built in battery like my past Bose systems. There is no battery with this unit and so placement is limited by outlet locations. If that is not a problem for you this is a very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: donald wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ve had this for a couple of months and honestly can't complain. The sound quality is rich and the system can fill up a room pretty well. The bluetooth pairing is fairly straight forward and quick. The 6 short cut keys work well and the app is useable. I do find that connecting to the wifi seems a bit cumbersome but its fairly simple once you ve done it once or twice. I only own one and as such have not tried to pair with another Sound touch system so can't speak to how well that works. All in all pretty solid and bespoke , exudes that high quality look which complements the room.
customer_reviews.author: Leonce

customer_reviews.title: Switched Back from SONOS
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Sonos 3 speaker is my office, it sounded good but just didn't have enough output. I researched and was going to go to a SONOS 5. After researching and a SONOS announcement about bricking used equipment, I decided to go back to Bose. I am completely satisfied with the Bose and have no second thought about buying more SONOS speakers.
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: I think the bose soundtouch 30 is an excellent speaker. It was a breeze to set up using the app. I use it for streaming Sirius xm radio and others and some Bluetooth streaming. It is a great product, it is pricey but it is worth it. The sound is great and the volume is more than most people would ever need. no worries on buying this one. If you like great sounding music, easy setup - get this, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James E Clevinger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible case construction/ alignment issues
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fit and finish on the back cover. Total mis-alignment on the first and second (replacement) units I received so will have to look for a different provider who stills does quality control. Had high hopes for the product for tunes in my bathroom so a major letdown.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Put this in the corner of a room and hear Beethoven piano music like never before, outdoing thousands of dollars of audio equipment. For some reason I lucked into a temporary price reduction of $200. Best money I EVER spent on audio.
customer_reviews.author: Tommaso

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Bose has a home run with the room filling speaker. My house is an open plan with vaulted ceilings and this one speaker covers all of the first floor. Very easy to connect to Bluetooth and Wifi. I attached an Echo Input device to control the speaker with my voice and YouTube prime music. Looks great and sounds rich and robust. I ended up purchasing a second speaker for the master bedroom. Highly recommend this Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: not user friendly at all
customer_reviews.text: have spent more time resetting up the network than we have spent listening to it if it hadn't cost so much money it would already be in the trash
customer_reviews.author: coys dad

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing. As a matter of fact
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is really in a class of its own. The sound quality is amazing. As a matter of fact, we decided to buy this speaker after listening to a song that we liked we could hear new sounds that we never heard before. It has been rediscovery to hear music on this speaker. I love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ma Chaitanyo Mahima

customer_reviews.title: These speakers do not stay connected to wifi.
customer_reviews.text: Works great the first time you set them up, but if you change routers, that's it. You only get one chance. I have four of these soundtouch speakers that can only be used one at a time through Bluetooth. Very disappointed I spent so much money on these!!! They sound great though, don't buy if you plan on using them together. Update: I downloaded the soundtouch software on to windows on my computer and was able to install the speakers onto the app with a USB cord and now they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: crouth

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundTouch is the pleasure you will enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Bose you can’t go wrong with the choice you made here and be more happy to own this bad boy here, especially when entertaining family and friends so make a smart choice and go Bose .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Automatic shut off hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Dumb thing turns itself off after 20 minutes of inactivity when set to AUX input. Then you need to go through a process to turn it back on. Checked the web and this is a very common complaint. No fix and Bose just basically shrugs it off. Very good sound but why the shut down hassle?
customer_reviews.author: dreadgong

customer_reviews.title: Has amazing sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother and because he had sold his sound system because he wanted something smaller with the same sound quality or better then what he had and he was also looking for something with a good bluetooth connection. And this thing matched all he ever wanted. And the sound quality surpassed what he ever thought could come out of a sound system that size. Certainly recommend anyone to buy this thing. It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: R.D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the Bluetooth or move the speaker around, so I can't rate those its properly. I had a issue with set up and connecting Alexa (Dot 3) Bose customer service was excellent! They walked me though the problem in about 10 minutes-thank you! Sound quality is fine, its nice that you can lower the bass through the Sound Touch app. I have several Bose products and this one doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: PeterG

customer_reviews.title: The sound is wonderful. The only thing this needs is the ability ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is wonderful. The only thing this needs is the ability to run off battery and have a handle for toting it around. We use ours in the pool area and patio. We have the sound bar 300s in two rooms with the sub. This is a great system allows same music or sound in each room at different levels and or a mix depending on the entertainment consumed. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Latham

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a home theatre!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality. Outstanding when connected to a Wi-Fi connection. Over a Bluetooth connection. But even the Bluetooth sounds amazing. The songs can fill up any size room that you can think of. I have brought it to work several times and the employees really are taken back of how great the speaker is and how awesome that sounds
customer_reviews.author: Ted Earl

customer_reviews.title: As usual, Bose is the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Bose is the Best! Replaced my 8 year old Soundock 10 with this, and could not be more happier! The sound is even better and all the connectivity options are fantastic. Love my phone as the Remote! Not really suprised, but it's always nice when you replace a favorite thing, and it gets Better! Well Done Bose!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: OMG it works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: OMG it works like a dream. It marries well with the smaller 20 and so i can play the same playlist in two rooms off my iphone with ease. Both play the same songs at the same time in different rooms with great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and I got it on cyber Monday so it was a great buy! Very easy to download the app and also connect to your library. It's a bit heavy, so I wouldn't consider it very portable, but if you're strong, I guess you can take it places. It seems very well made so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Franny F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Easy to set up. You can access radio stations all over the world. You can stream Amazon Music, Pandora and Tune In Radio. They just need to add Tidal... however you can just link your phone or tablet via Bluetooth and stream any other music service.
customer_reviews.author: NY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I BIT EXPENSIVE BUT ITS GREAT, THE SOUND IS PERFECT... I LOVE THE OPTIONS THAT YOU CAN PLAY MUSIC WITHOUT THE HELP OF A DEVICE, YOU JUST HAVE TO CONNECT TO YOUR WIFI AND PROGRAM YOUR FAVORITE MUSIC. IT IS COMPATIBLE WITH GOOGLE HOME
customer_reviews.author: TITO TRIMARCHI

customer_reviews.title: Holy Sound Batman!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Bose never disappoints. The bass is unbelievably potent coming from this machine. I'm listening to Metallica "One", and I can literally hear every bass pedal. It's amazing! If you're on the fence about this thing, get off and buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: ccincrco

customer_reviews.title: Not Airplay Compatible
customer_reviews.text: It took a while after purchasing to find out this latest model does NOT support airplay. Go with Sonos! Very disappointed at Bose for not labeling this in huge letters on its marketing material. Now I’m stuck with this handicapped speaker. The sound is ok for office use. But if you are used to a home theater setup with serious speakers then this will not be able to match that. This speaker’s weight is chunky so don’t expect to drag it around from desk to desk in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but can be somewhat finicky with connection to WiFi. Currently the speaker is displaying the incorrect time but i don’t rely on the display for my clock in my living room. It does sound great however and am not sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bosé
customer_reviews.text: I love all Bosé products and this one did not disappoint. Beautiful sound, amazing Bluetooth. It is not portable as it’s a bit heavy, but for me it works perfectly as I purchased it for home use. Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound distorted after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective. While it did have excellent sound for the 1st 6 weeks, it suddenly just stopped working - the sound becoming more and more distorted. first at just high levels, then at any sound level. Very disappointing! looking to return to Bose
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker! Sound is really good and loud! The only thing is I didn’t realize it was only 120 v electricity, so if you travel to 220 v countries you will need and adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Dusko Kelez

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wins Again!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. I have it in my living room and the sound fills the whole top level of my house. The Bose SoundTouch 30 has amazing sound with a lot of base. The speaker is designed to be placed in a stationary location because of its weight, which suits my need. This has been a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B. Twyman

customer_reviews.title: Great bose quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. Bose is well known for quality of electronics. Bluetooth is a great feature. Using this for A Work radio in a shipyard and very loud for all to hear
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I have always found Bose products to be great for sound quality. While these speakers did sound goos, they were not worth the price. The only good thing is that they can be very loud, but the quality is not worth 499$ and the bass are very bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor tech design
customer_reviews.text: It has an excelent sound quality and wifi features, but talking about the electrical aspect it has a bad design. It only support 110V and use to travel, I brought with me but I can't use it because the place use only 220V. Nowadays must equipment support 100-240 VAC and this one not. They could have done better. It is not that hard to add this feature even cheap equipment have this ability.
customer_reviews.author: dpineda

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bose is good quality and i am happy with the product. Glad i purchased the 30 and not the 20 version. Also wish i had purchased 2 when they were on sale.
customer_reviews.author: John P Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The soundtouch 30 is the best of the soundtouch series easy connecting, great sound and it displays the artist. I love this product and will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stanton L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Can't get enough Bose!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Bose products and even still have my first pair of 301s that I bought back in the 80's! The bass this thing puts out is insane! Love all the features, and being able to control it via the app on my phone is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad we decided to spend the extra money for the 30. We have a 20 for our living room and it sounds great. We wanted to add one in the game room but we were concerned that the 20 might not have enough punch to fill the room over a group of talking guests and arcade game noise. The 30 does it without a hitch. The depth of sound it amazing and it works flawlessly with our 20 upstairs and the SA-5 that is driving our outdoor speakers. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: UND3R5TAT3D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First, this speaker is huge. It is designed to be set up and connected to your home network. The audio quality of the speaker is in line with what one would expect from an expensive Bose speaker. Overall - this speaker is great for entertaining large groups, and works great with an Alexa device.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: Using the control app with android and a mac mini. On the mini - had to open firewall ports
customer_reviews.text: We replaced two large (and expensive) floor speakers and a subwoofer with this speaker. They were a tough act to follow: this speaker though, does it well! Sound quality is subjective to everyone. I wont tell you to get one because you will love it. But will tell you that we got one and love it!
customer_reviews.author: YourRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Bose
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, solid construction. It's substantial and will take up lots of space wherever you put it. I have several Bose products and this one does not disappoint. While the sound is exquisite, my only negative point of feedback is that it disconnects after 2 hours of not being touched. A minor inconvenience, but it can be a bit annoying. If this thing is on sale (I got mine for $299 as a Black Friday deal), it is an absolute must have.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: What a sound!
customer_reviews.text: Just gave to my wife as a birthday 🎁. She loves it! The sound is crisp and clear. Fills our 24’by 17’ living room. Volume at 1/2 to 3/4 is perfect. You will feal it😁. Going to get 2 10’s to link. Had it playing music in 2 min out of box!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GAMBARDELLA

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't work well for me, nor direct link to services like Pandora - but it sounds awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and works well as a blue-tooth speaker from a phone or PC. I've had poor results using the Iphone app or using the programmed keys while using Pandora or Amazon prime. It seems to play fine for a while then just stops playing for no known reason. Still happy I bought it, but is it more limited with the newer features than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Compton

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a Bose fan going back to 601s 301s this is good bit I have to give the nod to my Sonos beam for similar money.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Bose hits it out of the park!
customer_reviews.text: Once you find the spot you want to keep this at, just enjoy the sound quality. It can fill just about any Livingroom with sound and let the parties begin.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this speaker. I own an Acoustimass 15 system and havent installed them since I moved to the new house. All you need is a good wifi network and you're set. Bose always delivers.
customer_reviews.author: L D S

customer_reviews.title: Another triumph for Bose
customer_reviews.text: I was in two minds as to whether to buy this. I'd had bad experiences trying to use wifi to stream music in my home from my Macbook to my stereo. In the event this device is simply wonderful. A rich, resonant sound amply fills my living space. It works simply and well and I now spend my time listening to wonderful music rather than trying to figure out communication protocols and bandwidth limits.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ziesler

customer_reviews.title: Bose rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Excellent sound quality for price point. Easy to use. What I have come to expect from Bose
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally bought this! Clear, full sound-love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big purchase for me. I thought about getting it for a long time. I’m so glad I finally did it! It fills my house with that amazing, full, clear Bose sound quality. And I like loud music, it’s so clear no distortion at all.I enjoy music so much, so this was a great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Foligno

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up. It connects very easily to my cell phone. Great sound with a lot of clarity and depth. I will be purchasing the smaller series.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and portability but not Alexa comparable which was recommended by Amazon to buy with it. I always have to go thru few steps before it connects to Bluetooth on my phone
customer_reviews.author: Syeda R. Shergill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality and volume, was kind of tricky to set up but just be patient it will work, in my opinion Bose has the best sounding products on the market, this is my fifth Bose buy but not my last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great to not rely on Bluetooth and connect direct to wifi
customer_reviews.text: The ability to directly connect to wifi is great - no more having whomever is connected walk out of the room and have the music stop. The speaker itself has a great full sound and is easy to use. Not very portable and no battery are drawbacks, but this is not why we chose this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Waalkes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought several bose products before in the past and they always exceeded our expectations. until we got this one it looks nice is heavy but it’s not like a Bose should be. It says that works with Alexa and yes, but is very limited what you can do with it. very disappointed so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: jerry montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to the house
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic addition to the house. I have the SoundTouch 20 as well as four SoundTouch speakers. Easy to control from my phone and excellent sound in all rooms
customer_reviews.author: Heidi77

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing sound. Honestly. Wait for it to go on sale though. Remember you’re paying mostly for the name. Besides that it’s a pretty awesome setup.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy good sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality sound it just fills the room with nice sound music. Nice for a party..
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Software and support stinks
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Software is terrible. Tried to download the software for a new Mac and couldn't;t find it. Tried the Bose web site and it ran me in circles. Recommend for standalone use, but as a multi speaker system - don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is unbelievable. I recommend all Bose units. I purchased a SoundTouch 20 for my daughter last year and liked it so much I bought the 30 for our new Wine Bar-n. This will be used for many parties in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H H

customer_reviews.title: Bose strikes again!
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing sound quality from Bose! Your gonna pay up, however you get every penny worth out of this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: Y2jimmyk

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but Horrible Software
customer_reviews.text: Product sounds great - but the software is cumbersome and always needs an update - you can never just turn the speaker on without having to wait ten minutes for some update - the search engine on the software is not good as well
customer_reviews.author: Swords

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Deep & Strong Sound. Compatible with sound touch application. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: To whom this may concern I own quite a bit of bose equipment but this Bluetooth bose 30 is amazing. yes I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: carter webb

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I cant believe how loud it gets and how great it sounds!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bellew

customer_reviews.title: Best Wifey Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bose SoundTouch 30 Series lll as a Christmas gift for my wife... and it’s the best thing EVER... She loves it... She uses it daily... She loves to use it for parties and small gatherings... Everyone should purchase this item...Trust me, no regrets... Worth the money... Before I forget, is always great doing business with Amanzon... Is easy and convenient... Best part, shipping was fast and I did not have to pay extra for shipping....
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Torres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. It has the amazing sound quality from Bose and integrates well with Spotify. The preset buttons are an amazing functionality. It also has bluetooth and aux connections if wireless is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: Big room filling sound, amazing quality, and my 2nd purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Ball

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Speaker. Amazon Services Are Great.
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Sounding Speaker. The Amazon Services are Awesome The Bose name is enough. Very Good Experience With Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: If you like your speaker cutting out and scratch sounds
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big Bose man but like other reviewers before me said it does cut out and get a scratch sound. So unlike Bose but true
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound Connect with Alexa not so great Very heavyweight
customer_reviews.author: Adham Khamis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for Christmas and she love it The quality and sound is amazing We played it through Christmas and we all love it Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mcleish

customer_reviews.title: Never the easiest bluetooth set up but...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful design! Perfect fit to our needs and for an all in one, the sound is every bit that hope for...
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G Hosch

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bose
customer_reviews.text: It's a Bose sounds great a little heavy for taking with you. Also quality control on assembly could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, fills the room. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound, it really fills the room.
customer_reviews.text: You have to hold the power button on the remote for at least 7 to 10 seconds to power it on. At first I thought the batteries were bad. It is very easy to pair. I also like that I can pair it to my Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound system. I am really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Pokemon AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and clarity with Bluetooth connection. Will look for travel bag from Bose but highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Latta

customer_reviews.title: sound quality crystal cleat
customer_reviews.text: took me two days to get it set up having problems getting app to update and to get speaker to update , when everything was updated the speaker was awesome , wish setup was made easier
customer_reviews.author: Dale L Vorhees

customer_reviews.title: Expected more - Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Was not too satisfied with the sound quality. Expected a cleaner sound since this is a Bose unit. Have some issues with the power as well. The unit started smoking but still works. Have the feeling it may just stop working one day.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker, well built and super sound like all my Bose equipment. Easy to setup and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for a bluetooth speaker. It is not portable, plug in only.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, but not great at high volumes. I expected more from a Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Its super easy to set up, sounds amazing and makes the whole process of listening to music simple. Fills up a big room with sound. Serious speaker and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundTouch 30 speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of Bose speakers. But this one worked for like 2 days, the base shutdown/broke for no reason in the middle of a party. It was kinda embarrassing. But overall, the return was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: jose mancia

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundTouch 30
customer_reviews.text: This is my upgrade from the Bose Sound Dock10 and I love it. That should say it all, and I still use the 10. Bose keeps getting better. The Bose support is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Packs a great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my bose family of units. Great sound. Like that I can access via bluetooth with the bose app.
customer_reviews.author: Olddude

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clean sound with deep bass and all in a small footprint. This speaker is stellar! Easily connected to all my Bluetooth devices. My podcasts, music and tv have never sounded this good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No worth it, poor design/programming by Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Works only half of the time. Major connectivity issues. I gave it a chance based on the brand but should have trusted customer reviews. It is not an anomaly if there are this many complaints. Waste of money. Bose app never works too.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Banh

customer_reviews.title: Theater sound in a box
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about technology in sound. So, this one is by far the best speakers I have.
customer_reviews.author: linh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: quite bigger and heavier than expected, I don't consider it portable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Violeta Massa

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, setup was a easy, and I love the capability to stream my music library through their app. Gave it 4 stars just because it is a bit on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Reli T.

customer_reviews.title: Plan on using the AUX input? Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is decent but the AUX audio latency is a real deal breaker here. Practically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Spotted Marley

customer_reviews.title: Current needed
customer_reviews.text: The electricity current needed for the speaker differs out of USA perhaps Amazon should let customers know. I blow up the speaker the day it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kanyemba

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bose sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound of course, bought it for the wife and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J Rey

product_meta.title: Bose SoundTouch 30 wireless speaker, works with Alexa - Black
product_meta.description: Style:SoundTouch 30| Color:BlackYou want instant, easy access to millions of songs, thousands of radio stations and all your stored music any time you want it. And you don’t just want to hear it; you want to really feel it. Especially for holidays and big get-togethers you love to host. The SoundTouch 30 wireless speaker delivers, with proprietary waveguide technology and high-performance drivers to fill your largest rooms with deep, rich, true-to-life sound. What if you want to play a podcast in one room and stream music in another room? Or two? Or three? With SoundTouch, you can create a system of multi-room wireless speakers throughout your home. Start with one and add more later. Each speaker works with your home Wi-Fi network and Bluetooth devices to play the same music in every room or different music in different rooms. And only SoundTouch lets you find your favorite music faster, with six presets on the remote or the speaker itself. Love the Amazon Echo Dot? So does SoundTouch. Just pair your speaker with the Echo Dot and use your voice to play music, get your news, manage smart home devices and more. You can skip right to the fun part, because setting up your SoundTouch couldn’t be easier. Just install the free SoundTouch app on your mobile device, plug in your speaker, connect your device and control it all with the app and an intuitive remote. With the new Bose Skill for Alexa, you can now enjoy hands-free voice control of your SoundTouch speakers using any Alexa-enabled device – like the Echo Dot. It’s easy. Just open the Alexa app. Search “Bose” under the Skills menu. Follow the simple steps. And ask away. COMMON COMMANDS Alexa, ask Bose to play. Alexa, ask Bose to play in the kitchen. Alexa, ask Bose to play everywhere. Alexa, ask Bose to play Preset 1. Alexa, ask Bose what’s playing. Alexa, ask Bose to turn up the volume. Alexa, ask Bose to pause.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately) ; Audio Formats :AAC, Apple Lossless, MP3, WMA
The most powerful wireless speaker from Bose; Wave guide technology provides enough power to fill the largest rooms in your home with deep, rich sound
Works with your Wi Fi and Bluetooth devices to play music services like Amazon Music, Spotify Internet radio stations and your stored music library
Remote:4.5 H x 1.75 W x 0.5 D inches; Features six presets for your favorite playlists, stations and podcasts, and an OLED display for time, song, station information and more
Part of an entire family of multi room wireless speakers designed to grow with you; Wireless network compatibility: 802.11 b/g/n
Ask away; With the new Bose Skill for Alexa you can now enjoy hands free voice control of your SoundTouch speakers using any Alexa enabled device like the Echo Dot
Dimensions : System:9.7 inch H x 17.1 inch W x 7.1 inch D (25.75 lbs)
